channel.title: Dragon-History V2.0 [Delta] ~~New Release~~
channel.description:
Hey its me again aintaro, i promised u that i will release a V 2.0 source and client so here is it :
Features in V 1 -Edgeville PKing -Mage Bank pking -Almost all skills -New Home -New monsters ! ~~ Reaper~~ -Vengeance Skull -Special attacks [Obviously] -special attacks : Vesta longsword, Dragon claws -New items Dragon claws, Vesta longsword -Perfect armadyl wearing with Perfect bonus ! -Godwars -New models -Dragonfire shield fixed ! -Added object training, u still can train on npc if u want. -Added tutorials in the source, u can always try out they will work 100%
Features in V 2.0 -Revenant minigame. -pkPoints -Pkrewardz -Monsters in pest control -New pest control interfaces -Bandos warspear special -ags special increased -anti dupe added for trading -Added dragon plate bonus -Added new monsters -New boss -Added New tutorials in server -Removed all the glitches in clan chat -Strange fruit gives run and hp -Added some items to shops -Chinchompa hits from the distance, still some things to fix on. And alot more !
Features in Client V 2.0 Dragon platebody added Bandos warspear added All revenant monsters added Chinchompa added
What I am working on? -Pest control - Done -Better barrows system : Spade dig on each hill, realistic barrows hit, realistic rewards. 50% -New minigame - done -I want to add like 20-30 new models in the new client. 15% -More Monsters. 40% -Portal chambre.25% -Castle wars. 50% -Duel arena.40% -Funpk area. 50% -Anti syipkpker. 80% -Energy regeneration based on ur agility level. 30% -Chinchompa 100% like real rs. 70%
And finally, what everyone LOVES, Pictures. :D
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2wgyi5z.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2z9ictg.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/350tr8i.jpg[/img]

[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/4l15z8.jpg[/img]

[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/dgrqso.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/4s1anm.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/vrgeux.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2r615dk.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2r615dk.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2lvlrx3.jpg[/img]
[i][b]DOWNLOAD LINK[/b][/i] : http://www.mediafire.com/?ntntitoizmm
I hope you like my source and client, feel free to post ur comment :D
Credits : Delta Aintaro (me) And to the people who made the models.
If i forgot anyone just pm me and i will add :)
Thanks for reading !!
~~Aintaro~~
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Feel free to join [b]Dragon-History.no-ip.info[/b]

item.title: Dragon-History V2.0 [Delta] ~~New Release~~
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Why does everyone say “Oh it’s a delta, it’s shit…” Anyone with a delta source changes it completely and makes it something creative and each one is unique in its own way… Fuck anyone who hates deltas and gives 0 credits to this guy…

Mod Dcrew:

credits for you = 0%

yes, you.

For the server, hate the hp bar didn’t download but it looks fine :P.
Just read the post above mine. Sorry Kihomura didn’t mean to “gravedig” just wanted to reply.
